e107Plugin.name: Nofollow
e107Plugin.summary: An SEO oriented plugin aimed to discourage Dofollow backlink building SPAM in e107 powered websites.
e107Plugin.description: An SEO oriented plugin aimed to discourage back-link building SPAM in e107 powered websites. It automatically inserts an rel="nofollow" attribute to posted URLs in comment, chat, forum and other sections of the site. Links with an rel="nofollow" attribute generate no positive benefits in terms of search engine algorithmic perspective for the poster and they are mostly dropped out of search engine link graph.
